title: Estrangement
description: Your spouse disappears without a word for four years. When they return, they demand money. If you don’t give them what they want, they’ll expose your crimes and take away your children. What do you do?Afraid for herself and her children, Jenny finds herself blackmailed by her estranged husband, Freddy, who owes money to more menacing individuals.Caught between it all are the couple’s two boys, Dylan and Sam, afraid and unsure who to trust.
author: Craig Britton
